title: Embedded Visual
description: The description identifier of the geometry and material used to render this block when it it is embedded inside of another block (for example, a flower inside of a flower pot).

fields.title: Geometry
fields.description: The "minecraft:geometry" component that will be used when rendered inside of another block.

fields.title: Material Instances
fields.description: The "minecraft:material_instances" component that will be used when rendered inside of another block.
